email_content:
Dear Hope and Healing Foundation Team,

I hope you are all well. On behalf of the entire Outreach Department at Serenity Recovery Center, I want to thank you for the generous support you have provided over the past year. Your partnership has been instrumental in helping us bring hope and healing to individuals and families affected by addiction.

I am pleased to share that, thanks in large part to your contributions, our outreach program recorded a 40% increase in community engagement and a 15% improvement in patient recovery rates this past year (see our attached Annual Outreach Initiative Report for full details). Signature initiatives such as the “Steps to Sobriety” workshop series and our growing “Family Support Network” have proven especially effective in fostering sustained recovery and strengthening family resilience.

To build on this momentum, we are planning to:
• Expand the workshop series into three neighboring counties, reaching an additional 300 participants per quarter.
• Launch tele-support groups to remove transportation barriers for rural community members.
• Train and certify 20 new peer-mentors who will provide one-on-one support during the critical first 90 days of recovery.

These expansions will require additional resources for program staffing, training materials, and digital infrastructure. We kindly request the Hope and Healing Foundation’s consideration for an increased grant of $45,000 for the upcoming fiscal year, as well as any guidance or in-kind support you may be able to provide.

I would welcome the opportunity to discuss our plans in more detail and explore ways we can continue to collaborate. Please let me know a convenient time for a brief call or meeting.

Thank you again for your steadfast commitment to our mission. Together, we are changing lives and strengthening communities.

With gratitude,

[Your Name]
Outreach Program Director
Serenity Recovery Center
[Phone]
[Email]
